attributes.action: Tell Bus comanpies to give free travel for Students in full time edunaction
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'm 17 and have to pay adult fare for bus travel in the west Midlands why not give FREE travel for FULL TIME students not under 14 yrs old 

SO UNFAIR if i was PM for this country i would make this country better than Gordon Brown

Who with me sign this Petion thing!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
